聳.definition: to excite; to raise up; to shrug; high; lofty; towering

聳人聽聞.definition: to sensationalize (idiom); deliberate exaggeration to scare people

聳動.definition: to shake (a part of one's body); to shrug (shoulders); to create a sensation; to incite

聳立.definition: to stand tall; to tower aloft
